import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from '../services/product-service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { products: any; products$: any; constructor(private productService: ProductService) { this.products$ = productService.getAllProducts().subscribe((data) => { console.log(data); }); } }
